Fort_Wayne.Blackhawk Christian School: Blackhawk Christian School, established in 1973 in northeastern Fort Wayne, Indiana, is a private K-12 school with an enrollment of approximately 750 students and is operated by Blackhawk Ministries. The school's motto is "Scholars' minds. Servants' hearts." Mark Harmon is currently the principal of the middle/high school, Tim Wiegand is principal of the elementary school, while Linda Pearson is the superintendent.
